page.title: 02Transport
page.content: Several developments in this area have influenced "Transport."The most recent has been the building and opening of the{M25 }by Balfour Beatty Atkins at a cost of Â£20m,which links our area to the {M1,M3,M4 }and {M11 } to name but a few. Housing prices increased greatly as traffic increased. We calculated,on a recent survey beside an average road at 'off peak' hours that 150 cars, 2 buses, 11 vans,9 lorries,9 bicycles and 2 motorcycles passed. At 'on peak' hours we realised that there would be many more vehicles. Buses also play a vital role in transport.The buses themselves are mostly {Green Line }in this particular area but {Alder Valley }buses which have a main bus station in Addlestone can be seen occasionally.The main routes in a circle: {Addlestone
